languages.text: Тело несчастного падает у ног Вольного Торговца, а суровый голос капитана, грохочущий через вокс-усилитель, перебивает даже сторонние шумы. Вольный Торговец обещает лично казнить каждого, кто сейчас же не возьмет себя в руки.

traits.locale_text: Тело несчастного падает у ног Вольного Торговца, а суровый голос капитана, грохочущий через вокс-усилитель, перебивает даже сторонние шумы. Вольный Торговец обещает лично казнить каждого, кто сейчас же не возьмет себя в руки.

languages.text: The madman's body falls at the Rogue Trader's feet as {mf|his|her} commanding voice, magnified by a vox-amplifier, carries over all the noise. {mf|He|She} orders the crew to master themselves immediately, promising to personally execute anyone who fails to do so.
languages.original_text: Тело несчастного падает у ног Вольного Торговца, а суровый голос капитана, грохочущий через вокс-усилитель, перебивает даже сторонние шумы. Вольный Торговец обещает лично казнить каждого, кто сейчас же не возьмет себя в руки.

traits.locale_text: The madman's body falls at the Rogue Trader's feet as {mf|his|her} commanding voice, magnified by a vox-amplifier, carries over all the noise. {mf|He|She} promises that {mf|he|she} will personally execute anyone who doesn't get a hold of themselves this instant.

The madman's body falls at the Rogue Trader's feet as {mf|his|her} commanding voice, magnified by a vox-amplifier, carries over all the noise. {mf|He|She} promises that {mf|he|she} will personally execute anyone who doesn't get a hold of themselves this instant.

The madman's body falls at the Rogue Trader's feet as {mf|his|her} commanding voice, magnified by a vox-amplifier, carries over all the noise. {mf|He|She} orders the crew to master themselves immediately, promising to personally execute anyone who fails to do so.

The madman's body falls at the Rogue Trader's feet as {mf|his|her} commanding voice, magnified by a vox-amplifier, carries over all the noise. {mf|He|She} orders the crew to master themselves immediately, promising to personally execute anyone who fails to do so.

The madman's body falls at the Rogue Trader's feet as {mf|his|her} commanding voice, magnified by a vox-amplifier, carries over all the noise. {mf|He|She} orders the crew to master themselves immediately, promising to personally execute anyone who fails to do so.

languages.text: El cuerpo del lunático cae a los pies de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, cuya voz, ayudada por un vocoamplificador, se eleva por encima del griterío. Ordena a la tripulación que se recomponga de inmediato y promete ejecutar personalmente a quienes no lo hagan.
languages.original_text: The madman's body falls at the Rogue Trader's feet as {mf|his|her} commanding voice, magnified by a vox-amplifier, carries over all the noise. {mf|He|She} orders the crew to master themselves immediately, promising to personally execute anyone who fails to do so.

traits.locale_text: El cuerpo del lunático cae a los pies de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, cuya voz, ayudada por un vocoamplificador, se eleva por encima del griterío. Ordena a la tripulación que se recomponga de inmediato y promete ejecutar personalmente a quienes no lo hagan.

languages.text: 那个疯子的尸体倒在了行商浪人脚下。领主舰长通过音阵放大器下达了命令，{mf|他|她}的声音盖过了所有其他噪音。{mf|他|她}命令船员们立刻集中精神，安静下来，而且威胁说如果有人敢继续发疯的话，{mf|他|她}会亲手将其处决。
languages.original_text: The madman's body falls at the Rogue Trader's feet as {mf|his|her} commanding voice, magnified by a vox-amplifier, carries over all the noise. {mf|He|She} orders the crew to master themselves immediately, promising to personally execute anyone who fails to do so.

traits.locale_text: 那个疯子的尸体倒在了行商浪人脚下。领主舰长通过音阵放大器下达了命令，{mf|他|她}的声音盖过了所有其他噪音。{mf|他|她}命令船员们立刻集中精神，安静下来，而且威胁说如果有人敢继续发疯的话，{mf|他|她}会亲手将其处决。

languages.text: あらゆる騒音を伝えるヴォクスアンプが自由開拓者の命令する声を大きく響かせる中、狂人の体が{mf|彼|彼女}の足元に倒れた。自由開拓者は直ちにクルーに自身をコントロールするように言い、従わない者は自らの権利で処刑すると決心して伝えた。
languages.original_text: The madman's body falls at the Rogue Trader's feet as {mf|his|her} commanding voice, magnified by a vox-amplifier, carries over all the noise. {mf|He|She} orders the crew to master themselves immediately, promising to personally execute anyone who fails to do so.

traits.locale_text: あらゆる騒音を伝えるヴォクスアンプが自由開拓者の命令する声を大きく響かせる中、狂人の体が{mf|彼|彼女}の足元に倒れた。自由開拓者は直ちにクルーに自身をコントロールするように言い、従わない者は自らの権利で処刑すると決心して伝えた。

languages.text: Der Körper des Verrückten fällt {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} vor die Füße, während {mf|seine|ihre} befehlende Stimme, verstärkt durch einen Vox-Verstärker, den ganzen Lärm übertönt. {mf|Er|Sie} befiehlt der Besatzung, sich zu beherrschen, und verspricht, jeden, der dies nicht tut, persönlich hinzurichten.
languages.original_text: The madman's body falls at the Rogue Trader's feet as {mf|his|her} commanding voice, magnified by a vox-amplifier, carries over all the noise. {mf|He|She} orders the crew to master themselves immediately, promising to personally execute anyone who fails to do so.

languages.text: Le corps sans vie du forcené s'écroule aux pieds {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, qui utilise un amplificateur-vox pour se faire entendre par-dessus le vacarme. D'une voix autoritaire, {mf|il|elle} ordonne à l'équipage de se reprendre immédiatement, en menaçant d'exécuter {mf|lui-même|elle-même} quiconque serait incapable de recouvrer la raison.
languages.original_text: The madman's body falls at the Rogue Trader's feet as {mf|his|her} commanding voice, magnified by a vox-amplifier, carries over all the noise. {mf|He|She} orders the crew to master themselves immediately, promising to personally execute anyone who fails to do so.

traits.locale_text: Le corps sans vie du forcené s'écroule aux pieds {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, qui utilise un amplificateur-vox pour se faire entendre par-dessus le vacarme. D'une voix autoritaire, {mf|il|elle} ordonne à l'équipage de se reprendre immédiatement, en menaçant d'exécuter {mf|lui-même|elle-même} quiconque serait incapable de recouvrer la raison.

languages.text: Deli adamın vücudu, Hür Tacir'in ayaklarının dibine düşüyor. Hür Tacir'in voks yükseltici ile yükseltilmiş emreden ses tonu ise bu sırada oluşan gürültüyü bastırıyor. Mürettebata derhâl kendilerine gelmelerini emrediyor, gelemeyenleri ise bizzat öldüreceğini söylüyor.
languages.original_text: The madman's body falls at the Rogue Trader's feet as {mf|his|her} commanding voice, magnified by a vox-amplifier, carries over all the noise. {mf|He|She} orders the crew to master themselves immediately, promising to personally execute anyone who fails to do so.

traits.locale_text: Deli adamın vücudu, Hür Tacir'in ayaklarının dibine düşüyor. Hür Tacir'in voks güçlendirici ile yükseltilmiş emreden ses tonu ise bu sırada oluşan gürültüyü bastırıyor. Mürettebata derhâl kendilerine gelmelerini emrediyor, gelemeyenleri ise bizzat öldüreceğini söylüyor.
